byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York suspended doing any business with MF Global on Monday, and several major exchanges followed suit, as trading in MF Global shares was halted pending news about a potential bankruptcy filing and asset sale.
snippet: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York suspended doing any business with MF Global on Monday, and several major exchanges followed suit, as trading in MF Global shares was halted pending news about a potential bankruptcy filing and asset sale.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York

lead_paragraph: As investors await any word about MF Global's fate, the brokerage firm was hanging in limbo on Monday morning.

headline.main: Left in Limbo, MF Global Is Suspended From Trading
